xml:
Estradot<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Menopausal symptoms

By transdermal application

  • Adult

    Apply 1 patch twice weekly continuously, to be used with cyclical progestogen for 12–14 days of each cycle in women with a uterus, initiate therapy with 25 patch for 3 months; subsequently adjust according to response.

Osteoporosis prophylaxis

By transdermal application

  • Adult

    Apply 1 patch twice weekly continuously, to be used with cyclical progestogen for 12–14 days of each cycle in women with a uterus, initiate therapy with 50 patch; subsequently adjust according to response.

 Patient and carer advice

Patients should be advised on the application of Estradot patches.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
